text: Loai Taha (, ; born 26 November 1989) is an Arab- Israelihttp://blogs.timesofisrael.com/give-football-a-chance-to-break-the- cycle-of-violence/ football player who plays for Hapoel Be'er Sheva as a Center Back. ==Club career statistics== :(correct as of July 2015) {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Toto Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |-||-||-| |rowspan="1" valign="top"|Ahva Arraba |2007–2008 |rowspan="2"|Liga Bet |2||0||1||0||0||0||0||0||3||0 |- |rowspan="1" valign="top"|Hapoel Karmiel |2008 |11||1||0||0||0||0||0||0||11||1 |- |rowspan="1" valign="top"|Ahva Arraba |2008–2009 |rowspan="1"|Liga Alef |15||0||0||0||0||0||0||0||15||0 |- |rowspan="1" valign="top"|Ahva Arraba |2009–2010 |rowspan="1"|Liga Leumit |10||0||0||0||2||0||0||0||12||0 |- |rowspan="1" valign="top"|F.C.
